mapper.select: SELECT RECIPE.RECIPE_NO, RECIPE.MEMBER_ID, RECIPE.RECIPE_TITLE, RECIPE.VIEW_COUNT, MEMBER.MEMBER_NICKNAME, RECIPE_FILENAME FROM RECIPE LEFT JOIN MEMBER ON RECIPE.MEMBER_ID = MEMBER.MEMBER_ID ORDER BY RECIPE_NO

SELECT RECIPE.RECIPE_NO, RECIPE.MEMBER_ID, RECIPE.RECIPE_TITLE, RECIPE.VIEW_COUNT, MEMBER.MEMBER_NICKNAME, RECIPE_FILENAME FROM RECIPE LEFT JOIN MEMBER ON RECIPE.MEMBER_ID = MEMBER.MEMBER_ID WHERE RECIPE.RECIPE_NO = #{recipeNo}

SELECT DISTINCT RECIPE_TITLE, MEMBER_NICKNAME, VIEW_COUNT, R.RECIPE_NO, RECIPE_FILENAME FROM MEMBER M JOIN REFRIGERATOR FR ON FR.MEMBER_ID = M.MEMBER_ID JOIN SOURCES S ON FR.SOURCES_NO = S.SOURCES_NO JOIN RECIPE_SOURCES RS ON RS.SOURCES_NO = S.SOURCES_NO JOIN RECIPE R ON R.RECIPE_NO = RS.RECIPE_NO WHERE M.MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} AND FR.SOURCES_NO = S.SOURCES_NO
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM RECIPE WHERE RECIPE_TITLE LIKE '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%'
SELECT * FROM RECIPE WHERE RECIPE_TITLE LIKE '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%' ORDER BY RECIPE_NO DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RECIPE (RECIPE_NO, MEMBER_ID, RECIPE_TITLE) VALUES (SEQ_RECIPE_NO.NEXTVAL, #{memberId}, #{recipeTitle})
mapper.update: update recipe set VIEW_COUNT = VIEW_COUNT +1 where RECIPE_NO = #{recipeNo}
